A

AccumuloCluster - Interface in org.apache.accumulo.cluster
Defines a minimum required set of methods to run an Accumulo cluster.
AccumuloClusters - Class in org.apache.accumulo.cluster
Facilitates programmatic creation of an AccumuloCluster (Experimental, not guaranteed to stay backwards compatible)
AccumuloConfig - Interface in org.apache.accumulo.cluster
Configuration class for an AccumuloCluster (Experimental, not guaranteed to stay backwards compatible)
